metadata.feature_description: Shows server information and system status in a hover-based summary panel.

steps.action: Navigated to home page and identified PersonaBar logo element
steps.expected: PersonaBar logo should be visible in the left sidebar
steps.actual: PersonaBar logo (evoq branding) visible at top of left sidebar

steps.action: Hovered over PersonaBar logo using hoverIntent
steps.expected: Server summary panel should appear showing server information
steps.actual: Server summary panel appeared displaying: Evoq Engage, v. 10.01.01 (85), .NET Framework 4.8, Server Name EC2AMAZ-2AKAC3I, License Key Trial, plus links to Documentation, Customer Portal, Contact Support, and Logout

steps.action: Examined server summary panel content while hovering over PersonaBar logo
steps.expected: Server summary should display accurate product name, version, framework, server name, and license information
steps.actual: All server metrics displayed correctly: Product Name (Evoq Engage), Version (10.01.01 build 85), .NET Framework (4.8), Server Name (EC2AMAZ-2AKAC3I - AWS EC2 instance), License (Trial - matching trial banner). Links to Documentation, Customer Portal, and Contact Support are functional.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify summary dismissal on mouse leave

steps.action: Moved mouse away from PersonaBar logo to center of page
steps.expected: Server summary panel should disappear after hover timeout (200ms)
steps.actual: Server summary panel was dismissed and no longer visible. PersonaBar returned to normal state showing only icons.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Check summary display on different screen sizes

steps.expected: Server summary panel should still display correctly at smaller screen size

steps.action: Hovered over PersonaBar logo at 1024x768 resolution
steps.expected: Server summary should display all information correctly, adapting to smaller screen
steps.actual: Server summary panel displayed correctly at smaller resolution. All metrics visible and readable (Evoq Engage, v. 10.01.01, .NET Framework 4.8, Server Name EC2AMAZ-2AKAC3I, Trial License). Layout adapted properly with responsive design.

observations: The server summary panel uses jQuery hoverIntent plugin with 200ms timeout for smooth hover interactions
The summary panel includes quick links to Documentation, Customer Portal, and Contact Support external resources
A Logout button is included in the summary panel for quick access
The server name displays the actual AWS EC2 instance name (EC2AMAZ-2AKAC3I), confirming accurate server identification
License information (Trial) matches the trial warning banner displayed on the page
